hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select ta.ID_,ta.CID_,ta.CDATE_,ta.opName,ta.opDesc,IFNULL(tb.roleId,0) as roleId from core_op ta left join core_op_role_relation tb on tb.opId = ta.ID_ and tb.roleId = :relationId order by ta.opName
delete from core_op_role_relation where opId = :opId and roleId = :roleId
select count(*) as ds from core_op_role_relation where opId = :opId and roleId = :roleId
SELECT ta.opName,tb.roleId FROM core_op ta left join core_op_role_relation tb on tb.opId = ta.ID_ and tb.roleId in (select tc.roleId from core_role_user_relation tc where tc.userId = :userId)
